    createInputStrategy() - Method in class com.aoopproject.games.samegame.SameGameFactory
    This method from the GameFactory interface is not directly used by this factory's overridden SameGameFactory.setupGame() method for creating MouseInputStrategy, as that strategy requires a controller instance which is handled within setupGame.
    createInputStrategy() - Method in class com.aoopproject.games.sokoban.SokobanFactory
    This method from the GameFactory interface is not directly used by this factory's overridden SokobanFactory.setupGame() method for creating KeyboardInputStrategy, as that strategy requires a controller instance which is handled within setupGame.
